name: ABS (Australia)
desc: Australian Bureau of Statistics. Comprehensive indicators for Oceania.

name: Afrobarometer
desc: Standard public opinion microdata for African nations.

name: Bank of Canada
desc: Central bank and market rate database.

name: BIS Stats
desc: Bank for International Settlements banking and financial data.

name: BLS Data Portal
desc: Bureau of Labor Statistics data. Primary official source for inflation measurement and payroll employment growth.
vars: CPI-U, PPI, JOLTS Job Openings, Total Nonfarm Payrolls

name: CB Nigeria
desc: Central Bank of Nigeria financial data.

name: CE (Consumer Expenditure)
desc: The official CE surveys measuring buying habits of American consumers via Interview and Diary methods.

name: CHARLS
desc: China Health and Retirement Longitudinal Study.

name: College Scorecard
desc: US Dept of Education college outcomes data.

name: FRED (St. Louis Fed)
desc: The primary source for US macroeconomic time series including GDP and inflation.
vars: Real GDP, CPI Inflation, Interest Rates

name: HILDA Australia
desc: Household, Income and Labour Dynamics Australia.

name: IBGE Brazil
desc: Brazilian statistical institute for micro and macro indicators.

name: IMF WEO
desc: World Economic Outlook. Projections and historical data.

name: INE Spain
desc: Instituto Nacional de Estadística. Spain indicators.

name: INEGI Mexico
desc: Mexico official statistical and geographical database.

name: INSEE France
desc: National Institute of Statistics for the French economy.

name: IPUMS ATUS
desc: American Time Use Survey harmonized data.

name: IPUMS CPS
desc: Harmonized Current Population Survey. Primary source for official US labor force statistics and unemployment monthly rates.
vars: Employment Status, Hourly Earnings, Weekly Hours, Education

name: IPUMS USA (ACS/Census)
desc: Harmonized American Community Survey & Census data.

name: JOLTS
desc: Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey.

name: JSTAR
desc: Japanese Study of Aging and Retirement.

name: MOSPI India
desc: Official Indian source for National Accounts and sample surveys.

name: NBS China
desc: National Bureau of Statistics of China. Official macro indicators.

name: NIPA (BEA)
desc: National Income and Product Accounts measuring US economic activity.

name: Opportunity Atlas
desc: Social mobility outcomes by census tract.

name: SHARE
desc: Survey of Health, Ageing and Retirement in Europe.

name: SIPP
desc: Survey of Income and Program Participation.

name: UKCPR Welfare Data
desc: University of Kentucky Center for Poverty Research.
